description: Try our easy to follow Pineapple & Carrot Spiced Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Carrot cake,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Baking,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Pineapple & Carrot Spiced Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 225g can pineapple pieces in natural juice

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a 25cm springform cake tin and line base with baking paper. Sift flour, baking powder, bicarbonate of soda, 1 tsp salt and spices together in a bowl.

In a separate bowl, beat eggs, sugar, oil and vanilla together. Stir into dry ingredients until combined. Add carrot, pineapple and 1/4 cup of the juice and pecans. Mix together and pour into the cake tin.
Bake for about 1 hour or until a skewer inserted into the centre of cake comes out clean. Cool cake for 5 minutes then turn out carefully onto a wire rack to cool.
